title: Cartoon Chaos
synopsis: Welcome to Toontown, a charming little cartoon world where anything can happen! Simple joys, silly mishaps, and heartwarming moments await in this gentle, whimsical place.
setting: A gentle, whimsical cartoon world called Toontown. Everything has a soft, hand-drawn quality with simple shapes and warm, faded colors. The world is kind and playful - characters have big hearts and simple expressions. Think classic 1960s Saturday morning cartoons - uncomplicated, cheerful, and full of innocent fun.

starting_location.name: Toontown Square
starting_location.description: A cozy little town square with a friendly fountain in the center. Simple buildings with rounded edges line the streets. A clock tower stands tall but friendly. Everything feels warm and welcoming.
starting_location.visual_description: Simple cartoon town square, rounded buildings, friendly fountain, warm faded colors, soft pastel tones, minimal details, clean lines

main_character.name: Buddy
main_character.description: A friendly, simple cartoon character with a round head, dot eyes, a warm smile, and a small body. Wears a simple outfit. Has a kind expression and cheerful demeanor. Simple, clean design with minimal details.

goal: Have gentle fun! Create heartwarming and silly cartoon panels. Keep things simple, kind, and cheerful.
visual_style: 1960s Saturday morning cartoon style, simple flat shapes, faded warm pastel colors, minimal background details, clean black outlines, friendly rounded characters, vintage retro cartoon aesthetic, soft muted tones, simple expressions, hand-drawn look, UPA animation style, limited color palette
world_rules: Humor is innocent and silly, never mean
Everything has a soft, rounded quality
